response.final_text:
I can’t call a tool named "nonexistent_tool" — it isn’t available in my toolset. Available tools I can use are:

- functions.get_current_time — return current date/time  
- functions.calculator — evaluate a math expression (e.g., "2+2")  
- functions.request_approval — ask a human for approval before a sensitive action  
- multi_tool_use.parallel — run multiple of the above tools in parallel

Tell me what you want to accomplish (or give an example), and I’ll call the appropriate available tool(s) or do it directly. If you intended a different tool, describe its purpose and I’ll suggest how to achieve the same result with the tools above.
